## 부가설명 및 특이사항
위시리스트를 등록하는 API 입니다.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Version","in":"header","description":"API 버전","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1.0"},{"name":"clientId","in":"header","description":"쇼핑몰 클라이언트 아이디","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-client-id"},{"name":"platform","in":"header","description":"클라이언트 플랫폼 (PC, MOBILE_WEB, AOS, IOS)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"PC"},{"name":"language","in":"header","description":"언어 (기본 값: ko)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"ko"},{"name":"accessToken","in":"header","description":"회원 엑세스 토큰","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-access-token"},{"name":"Shop-By-Authorization","in":"header","description":"액세스 토큰(Oauth2 스펙)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"Bearer test-access-token"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","description":"위시 등록리스트","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"orderCnt":{"type":"number","description":"구매개수 (nullable)","example":1},"optionInputs":{"type":"array","description":"구매자 입력형 옵션","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"inputValue":{"type":"string","description":"구매자 작성형 입력 값","example":"14호"},"inputLabel":{"type":"string","description":"구매자 작성형 입력 이름","example":"사이즈"},"inputNo":{"type":"number","description":"구매자 입력형 옵션 번호 (nullable)","example":10}}}},"optionNo":{"type":"number","description":"옵션번호","example":1258932},"productNo":{"type":"number","description":"상품번호","example":100398947},"additionalProductNo":{"type":"number","description":"추가상품번호 (nullable)","example":0}},"description":"위시 등록리스트"},"title":"wish-55669610"},"examples":{"post-wish":{"value":"[{\"productNo\":1,\"optionNo\":1,\"additionalProductNo\":0,\"orderCnt\":1,\"optionInputs\":[{\"inputNo\":null,\"inputLabel\":\"label\",\"inputValue\":\"value\"}]}]"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
